p: Collection of adult dengue vector mosquitoes. Adult dengue vector mosquitoes were collected mainly using mouth aspirators. In addition, back-pack aspirators and hand-catching nets were also used to collect adult mosquitoes. Both indoor and outdoor resting and landing dengue vector mosquitoes were collected following WHO guidelines [ 13]. The collections were initiated in the dawn around 6.00 Ante Meridiem (a.m.) in the study households and continued till around 11.00 a.m. While every outdoor potential resting places were examined, bed rooms, coat racks, curtains, indoor flower trees and potential dark places were examined in the household interior. In each household, adult collections were conducted for 15 minutes. Special precautions were taken to avoid risk of accidental biting by mosquitoes.
